EmailTemplate.name: TKD_ChangeStageDealCategory
EmailTemplate.subject: Takedown "{!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name}" has been changed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
You are receiving this notification because the Customer Name {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.CPL_rb_Entity_Name_CP__c} where the Deal Category is equal to {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.CPL_ls_Deal_Category__c} and the Takedown CP {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name} stage has been changed to {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.TKD_ls_takedown_stage__c} {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.CPL_rb_Entity_Name_CP__c} by: {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.LastModifiedBy}
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here .
Regards, Engen Capital.
